item.description:
Join Fellow Sierra Club members and friends as we open the office for our annual Winter Office Open House on Wednesday, Dec 9- 4:30-7:30pm.

Enjoy conversation, mulled cider and appetizers while inspecting the office which we will have franticly cleaned and neatened the day before. (Or come the day before the cleaning!)

Share what you think about Obama’s performance in Copenhagen for the climate change talks, or what your plans are for your holiday. No agenda except Fun! However, if you are interested in learning more about what we're doing and how you can help, we’ll be ready to talk about that too!

Thanks for being part of our meet-ups this past year and supporting the environment and the Sierra Club.

P.S. Winter Weather Plan- in the absence of an advisory from the Governor that no one should leave his/her house, if the subway is running, we'll be there enjoying ourselves. We hope you'll come too!

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Office Open House
